app1.name: Bee TV
app1.description: Bee TV provides a simple tile view presentation with integration to all major services along with regular updates.

app2.name: Cuco TV
app2.description:
Cuco TV provides a "one-click" style streaming app without the need to deal with choosing streaming sources.
Supports both Real-Debrid and Trakt.

app3.name: CinemaHD
app3.description: Cinema HD is another great alternative with a tile view interface with integration to all major services along with regular updates.

app4.name: Film Plus
app4.description: Film Plus is yet another great alternative with a tile view interface with integration to all major services along with regular updates.

app5.name: Nova TV
app5.description: Nova TV is another great alternative with a tile view interface with integration to all major services along with regular updates.
